messages.msgSnippet: oh YAY lists !! work is incredably slow this week so I have time... if I can get them I will watch and write a review, and yes of course I would like more
messages.messageBody:
oh YAY lists !!
work is incredably slow this week so I have time... if I can get them I will watch and write a review, and yes of course I would like more mainstreem !!!!!
--- On Tue, 10/28/08, secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:
From: secretary <secretarytocapt3@...>
Subject: [SHQ] Got Movie Reviews?
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, October 28, 2008, 2:50 PM











Hello,



Working on some stuff for the site behind the scenes.



If you visit http://shinsengumih q.com/shq/ ?page_id= 83

click on the link "filmography" and you'll see a very long list of Shinsengumi

films (Imdb does not list all films featuring the Shinsengumi) .



Now, we would love to post more expanded reviews of films. So if you've

seen a film/anime featuring the guys please forward your review to:

secretarytocapt3( at)hotmail. com .



We also have a list of films which already have reviews but they aren't live

yet until I reformat font/images. So if you want to give your opinion on

more mainstream films such as Gohatto or Mibugishiden just send me an

email.



Due to the fact that the Shinsengumi are featured in anything from rated-G

anime for kids, high brow cinema to adult films it is all right to write

clever/cynical reviews because let's face it some of these films really

deserve it. (^_^)



I'm currently figuring out an efficient way of putting things back online

because I've just determined that having Photoshop, WS/FTP, Wordpress,

Wordpress edit mode, html builder all open at the same time is really

slowing me down.



ttyl





























[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
Hello,

Working on some stuff for the site behind the scenes.

If you visit http://shinsengumihq.com/shq/?page_id=83
click on the link "filmography" and you'll see a very long list of Shinsengumi
films (Imdb does not list all films featuring the Shinsengumi).

Now, we would love to post more expanded reviews of films. So if you've
seen a film/anime featuring the guys please forward your review to:
secretarytocapt3(at)hotmail.com .

We also have a list of films which already have reviews but they aren't live
yet until I reformat font/images. So if you want to give your opinion on
more mainstream films such as Gohatto or Mibugishiden just send me an
email.

Due to the fact that the Shinsengumi are featured in anything from rated-G
anime for kids, high brow cinema to adult films it is all right to write
clever/cynical reviews because let's face it some of these films really
deserve it. (^_^)

I'm currently figuring out an efficient way of putting things back online
because I've just determined that having Photoshop, WS/FTP, Wordpress,
Wordpress edit mode, html builder all open at the same time is really
slowing me down.

ttyl
